      • executeAction

        public boolean executeAction(javax.swing.JComponent parent,
                             SdkListItem item,
                             Consumer<? super SdkListItem> afterExecution)
        Executes an action that is associated with the given .
        If there are no actions associated, method returns false, the is NOT executed
        If there is action associated, it is scheduled for execution. The callback is ONLY if the action execution ended up successfully and a new item was added to the model. In that case the callback is executed after the model is updated and the syncModel() is invoked. The implementation may not execute the callback or and model update for any internal and non-selectable items
        Returns:
        true if action was started and the callback could happen later, false otherwise

      • processSelectedElement

        public void processSelectedElement(javax.swing.JComponent parent,
                                   SdkListItem item,
                                   Consumer<? super SdkListItem> afterNewItemAdded,
                                   Consumer<? super SdkListItem> onSelectableItem)
        Executes an action that is associated with the given .
        If there are no actions associated, the callback is executed directly and the method returns, the is NOT executed
        If there is action associated, it is scheduled for execution. The callback is ONLY if the action execution ended up successfully and a new item was added to the model. In that case the callback is executed after the model is updated and the syncModel() is invoked. The implementation may not execute the callback or and model update for any internal and non-selectable items
